Detailed Description

betaNestedObject

Author:
Michael Betancourt, Massachusetts Institute of Technology
Markov chain with the invariant distribution . Note that has the finite support and constrained Hamiltonian Monte Carlo is necessary to to avoid transitions outside of this support.
Examples:

main.cpp.
